segment.source: Microsoft Application Virtualization Getting Started Guide

segment.source: Microsoft Application Virtualization Getting Started Guide
segment.target: Microsoft Application Virtualization Getting Started Guide

segment.source: This Getting Started Guide provides essential information that will help you design your Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) system and assist in your deployment and upgrade planning.
segment.target: This Getting Started Guide provides essential information that will help you design your Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) system and assist in your deployment and upgrade planning.

segment.source: In This Section
segment.target: In This Section

segment.source: Overview of Application Virtualization
segment.target: Overview of Application Virtualization

segment.source: Provides a summary of the App-V system features.
segment.target: Provides a summary of the App-V system features.

segment.source: Planning for Application Virtualization System Deployment
segment.target: Planning for Application Virtualization System Deployment

segment.source: Provides the guidance necessary to plan the implementation and deployment of your Application Virtualization system, and to migrate from previous versions.
segment.target: Provides the guidance necessary to plan the implementation and deployment of your Application Virtualization system, and to migrate from previous versions.

segment.source: Application Virtualization Deployment and Upgrade Considerations
segment.target: Application Virtualization Deployment and Upgrade Considerations

segment.source: Provides information about hardware and software requirements for installing the various Application Virtualization components and upgrade information.
segment.target: Provides information about hardware and software requirements for installing the various Application Virtualization components and upgrade information.

segment.source: About Microsoft Application Virtualization 4.5
segment.target: About Microsoft Application Virtualization 4.5

segment.target: Describes the features introduced in App-V 4.5 and also includes the App-V 4.5 release notes documentation.
